forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 57F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...thunderstorms likely this evening ...continued blustery with rain likely overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...thunderstorms likely this evening ...continued blustery with rain likely overnight. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 38F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 51F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 12C. SE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 53F. ESE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
